| eval score_{run_month}='ssphp.score.score'
| eval current_month="score_".strftime(now(),"%Y-%m") | foreach score_* [| eval current_month_score=if("<<FIELD>>"='current_month','<<FIELD>>','current_month_score')]

| appendpipe [| stats max(run_month) as run_month by ssphp.use_case.id | eval ry=mvindex(split('run_month',"-"),0), rm=mvindex(split('run_month',"-"),1), nml=mvrange('rm'+1,13) | fields - run_month | mvexpand nml | eval run_month='ry'."-".substr("00".'nml',len("00".'nml')-1,2), score_{run_month}="" | fields - run_month, nml, rm, ry ]
